Text: So the Light's vaunted justice has finally arrived?
Shall I lay down Frostmourne and throw myself at your mercy, Fordring?
You delivered the greatest fighting force this world has ever known...
right into my hands - exactly as I intended!
You shall be rewarded for your unwitting sacrifice.
ARTHAS! I swore that I would see you dead and the Scourge dismantled!
I'm going to finish what I started at Light's Hope!
LIGHT GRANT ME ONE FINAL BLESSING!
GIVE ME THE STRENGTH... TO SHATTER THESE BONDS!
